query.statement:
SELECT X.PJT, X.HNO, X.SEQNO, X.A_1_1, X.A_1_2, X.A_1_3, X.A_1_4, X.A_1_5, X.A_1_6, X.A_1_7, X.A_1_8, X.A_2_1, X.A_2_2, X.A_2_3, X.A_2_4, X.A_2_5, X.A_2_6, X.A_2_7, X.A_2_8,
X.B_1_1, X.B_1_2, X.B_1_3, X.B_1_4, X.B_1_5, X.B_1_6, X.B_2_1, X.B_2_2, X.B_2_3, X.B_2_4, X.B_2_5, X.B_2_6
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11076DB AS X
WHERE X.PJT = #PJT# AND X.HNO = #HNO# AND X.SEQNO = #SEQNO# AND X.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
